title: Bette Davis Landed Her Biggest Role After Posting an Ad in a Newspaper?
subtitle: Bette Davis is rumored to have landed her role in 'What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?' through placing an ad in a Hollywood publication seeking employment as an actress.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Bette Davis landed her role in What Ever Happened to Baby Jane? through placing an ad in a Hollywood publication seeking employment as an actress.
